meanings.definition: In a bold, audacious, or daring manner.
meanings.sent1: She jumped bodaciously off the high diving board.
meanings.sent2: He bodaciously challenged the bully to a game of chess.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel bodaciously stole a nut from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The superhero bodaciously leaped from building to building.
meanings.sent5: The explorer bodaciously ventured into the uncharted jungle.

meanings.sent1: The magician performed a bodaciously cool trick.
meanings.sent2: She received a bodaciously beautiful bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The cake was bodaciously decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a bodaciously vibrant palette.
meanings.sent5: The concert was a bodaciously unforgettable experience.
